scripts.build: concurrent -p command 'npm run build-js' 'npm run build-css'
scripts.build-css: lessc assets/site.less | autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions, > 5%' | tee dist/site.css | cleancss -o dist/site.min.css
scripts.build-js: browserify . -d --extension=.jsx | tee dist/bundle.js | uglifyjs - -c warnings=false -m | tee dist/bundle.min.js | gzip > dist/bundle.min.js.gz
scripts.watch: concurrent -p command 'npm run watch-js' 'npm run watch-css' 'npm run watch-browser'
scripts.watch-css: npm run build-css && onchange assets/** -- npm run build-css
scripts.watch-js: watchify src/browser.jsx -d --extension=.jsx -v -o 'tee dist/bundle.js | uglifyjs - -c warnings=false -m | tee dist/bundle.min.js | gzip > dist/bundle.min.js.gz'
